docs.snippet: Tom Izzo has had unparalleled success over his 17 seasons at Michigan State, but since 2005 he has been unable to defeat Duke Coach Mike Krzyzewski, with whom he is close....
docs.lead_paragraph: Tom Izzo has had unparalleled success over his 17 seasons at Michigan State, but since 2005 he has been unable to defeat Duke Coach Mike Krzyzewski, with whom he is close.
docs.abstract: William C Rhoden Sports of The Times column compares Michigan State Coach Tom Izzo to Duke Coach Mike Krzyzewski, who are set to meet in NCAA men's basketball tournament Final Four; notes Michigan State is 1-3 against Duke in NCAA tournament history.

headline.main: Michigan State’s Tom Izzo Looks to Knock Out a Friend, and a Blot on His Résumé
headline.print_headline: Izzo Looks to Erase Blot on Résumé by Knocking Out a Friend

docs.snippet: In several ways it is a new world for big-time college sports, including a change in how sexual assault is discussed in locker rooms....
docs.lead_paragraph: In several ways it is a new world for big-time college sports, including a change in how sexual assault is discussed in locker rooms.
docs.abstract: Many college basketball coaches are going beyond Title IX and university policies on sexual harassment and sexual assault prevention by teaching and mentoring athletes on how to treat women.

headline.main: College Teams Add Assault Prevention to the Basics They Teach
headline.print_headline: College Teams Add Assault Prevention to the Basic Drills

docs.snippet: His accent and heritage are middle-class English, but there is little doubt that Chris Wyles cherishes the memories of his childhood in America....
docs.lead_paragraph: His accent and heritage are middle-class English, but there is little doubt that Chris Wyles cherishes the memories of his childhood in America.

headline.main: An American Makes His Mark on a British Rugby Team
headline.print_headline: An American Makes His Mark on a British Rugby Team

docs.snippet: Under pressure from the chasing pack and rocked on their heels by a Charlie Adam bolt from the blue, Chelsea showed cool heads to extend their Premier League to seven points on Saturday with a 2-1 home win over Stoke City....
docs.lead_paragraph: Under pressure from the chasing pack and rocked on their heels by a Charlie Adam bolt from the blue, Chelsea showed cool heads to extend their Premier League to seven points on Saturday with a 2-1 home win over Stoke City.

headline.main: Steely Chelsea Unfazed by Chasing Pack or Adam Stunner
headline.print_headline: Steely Chelsea Unfazed by Chasing Pack or Adam Stunner

docs.snippet: Erik Helland, who worked for the Chicago Bulls for 25 years, has used a program called Metrifit to closely monitor players’ diets, sleep patterns and exercise regimens....
docs.lead_paragraph: Erik Helland, who worked for the Chicago Bulls for 25 years, has used a program called Metrifit to closely monitor players’ diets, sleep patterns and exercise regimens.
docs.abstract: Wisconsin men's basketball strength and conditioning coach Erik Helland, who is busy preparing team for NCAA tournament semifinals against Kentucky, uses app called Metrifit to closely monitor players' diets, sleep patterns and exercise regimens.

headline.main: A Strength Coach for Wisconsin Uses an App That Works More Than Thumb Muscles
headline.print_headline: A Strength Coach Uses an App That Works More Than Thumb Muscles
